skill.s1.name: Passionate Singing
skill.s1.description: Deal [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK Elec damage[/b][/color] to all foes.

If there is a [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip], the [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip] deals an additional [color=#fcff37][b]Elec damage[/b][/color] based on [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] of their [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] to the main target.
skill.s2.name: Improvised Solo
skill.s2.description: Selects 1 ally to become the [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip], increase their [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] based on [color=#fcff37][b]24%[/b][/color] own [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] for 3 turns, up to [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
There can only be 1 [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip].
skill.s3.name: Finale: Range Unleash
skill.s3.description: Selects 1 ally to immediately uses their [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color], increase that [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT damage[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
[color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color] used by this skill will not count towards their [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT cooldown[/b][/color].
If the target is a SEES member, then increase their next [color=#fcff37][b]Theurgy Final DMG Amp[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Increase all allies' [color=#fcff37][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 4 actions.
Restore [color=#fcff37][b]10% HIGHLIGHT Energy[/b][/color] after each ally's action, up to [color=#fcff37][b]40%[/b][/color].
skill.p1.name: Stress
skill.p1.description: When an ally uses [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color]/[color=#fcff37][b]Theurgy[/b][/color], immediately increase their [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
Increase this effect by 1.5x if they are the [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip].
skill.p2.name: Sweep Picking
skill.p2.description: After an ally uses [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color]/[color=#fcff37][b]Theurgy[/b][/color], you immediately restore [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] + [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color] to the lowest [color=#fcff37][b]HP%[/b][/color] ally.
awareness.a0.name: My Light
awareness.a0.description: At the start of battle, [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] has a 1 turn cooldown.

Permanently increases own [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]20%[/b][/color] after using [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref], up to 2 stacks.
Afterwards, permanently increases the cooldown for [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 1 turn, up to 3 turns.
awareness.a1.name: Greet My Dawn Star
awareness.a1.description: At the start of battle, selects 1 ally to become the [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip], prioritizing the highest ATK Assassin or Sweeper ally.
awareness.a2.name: Lonely Shimmers
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s1][color=#ffd800][b][u][Passionate Singing][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
[ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
awareness.a3.name: Mr. Light
awareness.a3.description: When using [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref], immediately increases that [color=#fcff37][b]ally's DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]30%[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
awareness.a4.name: Painted My Scenes
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s2][color=#ffd800][b][u][Improvised Solo][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
[ref=hl][color=#ffd800][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
awareness.a5.name: Change My Life
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#ffd800][b][u]HIGHLIGHT[/u][/b][/color][/ref] Enhanced: Increase [color=#fcff37][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] duration to 6 ally actions.
Increase [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT Energy[/b][/color] restore cap to [color=#fcff37][b]60.0%[/b][/color] and decrease all other allies' [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT cooldown[/b][/color] by 1 turn.
awareness.a6.name: My Mr. Right
awareness.a6.description: [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] is ready at the start of battle.
Permanently decrease [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] cooldown by 1 turn, up to 2 turns.

Increase all [color=#fcff37][b]allies' damage[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]15.0%[/b][/color] after using [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale: Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref], up to 2 stacks.
